comment: /**  * Creates a stream on the given collection if it is not null  *  * @param value  the collection  * @return A stream of elements or an empty stream if the collection is null  */
code: /**  * Creates a stream on the given collection if it is not null  *  * @param value  the collection  * @return A stream of elements or an empty stream if the collection is null  */ public static <C> Stream<C> stream(Collection<C> value) {     return value != null ? value.stream() : Stream.empty(). }

comment: /**  * Creates a stream of entries on the given Map if it is not null  *  * @param value  the map  * @return A stream of entries or an empty stream if the collection is null  */
code: /**  * Creates a stream of entries on the given Map if it is not null  *  * @param value  the map  * @return A stream of entries or an empty stream if the collection is null  */ public static <K, V> Stream<Map.Entry<K, V>> stream(Map<K, V> value) {     return value != null ? value.entrySet().stream() : Stream.empty(). }
